verbose_text: Calcitonin gene related peptide (CGRP), a 37-amino acid peptide widely distributed in the central and peripheral nervous systems and mainly in sensory nerves, has been shown to inhibit proinflammatory cytokine production and augment the release of IL-10 by monocytes.
evidence: Calcitonin gene-related peptide (CGRP), a 37-amino acid peptide widely distributed in the central and peripheral nervous systems and mainly in sensory nerves              , has been shown to inhibit proinflammatory cytokine production
